Package fr.sorbonne_u.components

Class AbstractComponent.AbstractTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent.AbstractTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI.ComponentTask, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContinuation
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractComponent
    public abstract static class AbstractComponent.AbstractTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentI.ComponentTask
    The abstract class AbstractTask provides the basic method implementations for component tasks.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AbstractTask()
      create a task which uses the owner component method only.
      AbstractTask​(java.lang.String pluginURI)
      create a task which uses both the owner component method and methods of its designated plug-in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AbstractComponent getTaskOwner()
      return the reference to the component owner of the executor service that will execute this task.
      java.lang.Object getTaskProviderReference()
      return the reference to the component owner or its plug-in that will execute this task.
      void setOwnerReference​(ComponentI owner)
      sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the task to access its services.

      • AbstractTask

        public AbstractTask​(java.lang.String pluginURI)
        create a task which uses both the owner component method and methods of its designated plug-in.

        Contract

         pre    pluginURI != null
 post   true    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        pluginURI - URI of a plug-in installed on the owner.
